sentence.Network_en: Pertaining to the occurrence of events in time sequence, with no simultaneity or overlap of events.
sentence.Network_cn: 用于修饰或说明诸事件按时间顺序出现, 既不同时也不重叠.

sentence.Network_en: Estimation of a single function under simultaneity will result in biased and inconsistent estimates.
sentence.Network_cn: 存在此同时性(simultaneity),对单一方程式的估计将导致偏误(biased)与不一致(inconsistent) 的估计.

sentence.Network_en: The non - simultaneity in operation brought error to measuring results and data correction.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际操作上的“ 非 同时性”给背景噪声的测量结果及用于修正均带来一些失准问题.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 同时性：两个或多个事件在同一时刻发生则属于同时性（Simultaneity）。并发性：两个或多个事件在同一时间间隔内发生则属于并发 …

在同步性（simultaneity）的情况下，偶然一致（coincidentally）被严格定义为发生在同一时间，因为奇异点并非一刹那或者瞬间，而 …

信息词汇英语翻译(R-Z) ... simultaneous mode 同时处理方式 simultaneous operation 同时操作 simultaneous processing 同时处理.

means.word_mean: 1. happening or existing or done at the same time

auth_sentence.content: Lack of an absolute frame of reference percludes simultaneity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lack of an absolute frame of reference percludes simultaneity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lack of an absolute frame of reference percludes simultaneity.

auth_sentence.content: So every moment of your life is in the fridge of total simultaneity.
auth_sentence.res_content: So every moment of your life is in the fridge of total simultaneity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So every moment of your life is in the fridge of total simultaneity.

auth_sentence.content: Since simultaneity does not exist in the absolute sense, there is also no such thing as "an absolute now".
auth_sentence.res_content: Since simultaneity does not exist in the absolute sense, there is also no such thing as "an absolute now".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Since simultaneity does not exist in the absolute sense, there is also no such thing as "an absolute now".

stems_affixes.word_buile: simult相类似,一样+aneous……特征的→时间相同的
simultaneous[adj.同时的,同时存在的]+ly表副词→adv.同时地
simult相类似,一样+aneity表名词→n.同时发生,同时

stems_affixes.type_exp: 来自aneous,表名词,表示"性质,状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: instant立即的+aneity性质,状态→n.瞬时性,即时性
simult类似+aneity性质,状态→n.同时发生,同时
spont个人意志,自愿+aneity性质,状态→n.自然,自发
